name: Knubbelchen-Minis
description: Dieses Mini-Knubbelchen ist ideal zur “Resteverwertung”… jede (Socken-)Wollstärke passt.
full_text: This mini knob is ideal for “using leftovers”... any thickness of (sock) wool is suitable. They are simply ideal as a bag and/or key ring... and a great “souvenir”. These instructions are a “miniaturization” of the Knubbelchen instructions and were created and published with the kind permission of pezi888. THANKS pezi888: Your instructions for the super cuddly little knobs gave me the idea of ​​knitting the mini knobbies. These instructions are now also available in English. THANKS to Manfredovna for the super fast translation. “Knubblechen Mini, free pattern, now available in English, too”. Many thanks to Manfredovna for the very fast translation… These instructions are now also available in Danish. THANKS to Marianne “Mafimi” for the translation. “Knubblechen Mini, free pattern, now available in Danish, too”. Many thanks to Marianne “Mafimi” for the translation…
